amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funds for the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the funds available for grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 243 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 243 (Roll no. 418).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Garrett.
